articles.content: The diabetes drug Ozempic will cost you roughly $1,000 a month in the United States. Its a whopping sticker price. And if youre using it for weight loss, insurance is unlikely to cover it, even if yo… [+9093 chars]

articles.title: What's more important as you age — stretching, balance work or strength training? - News8000.com - WKBT
